title: rename failed
body:
### expected behaviour
a folder name should be changed through oc web interface:

i have 5 folders: 
* clientsync
* documentos
* escritorio
* musica
* zotero

i go to web interface and rename clientsync folder -> new name should be owncloud and i should see:
* owncloud
* documentos
* escritorio
* musica
* zotero

### actual behaviour
it doesn't change name. then when i click there on cliensync (old folder name) noting happend. 

"new folder" is accesible by url, but it's no displayed in "root" files folder. i mean, when i put new name on the url, like this: <root>/index.php/apps/files?dir=//owncloud -> i could see the content !

### steps to reproduce
1. go to clientsync folder and clic on rename button at right
2. once renamed, log out and login or update your browser

### server configuration
operating system: ubuntu 12.04.2 lts

web server: apache 2.2.22

database: mysql-server 5.5.29

php version: php 5.3.10-1ubuntu3.6

owncloud version: 5.0.3

### client configuration
browser: firefox 20 and chromium versiã³n 25.0.1364.160

operating system: linux mint 13 (ubuntu 12.04)

### logs

#### web server error log
```
[mon apr 08 17:46:18 2013] [error] [client 164.73.15.104] file does not exist: /usr/share/owncloud/owncloud, referer: https://nube.data.cse.edu.uy/remote.php/core.css?285e19f20beded7d215102b49d5c09a0
```

#### owncloud log (data/owncloud.log)
```
{"app":"search_lucene","message":"failed to extract meta information for \/0d7d9f80-d31e-1031-8b3c-31c8f205a781\/files\/zotero\/d2gmtcbn.prop: unable to determine file format","level":2,"time":1365453978}
{"app":"php","message":"ldap_start_tls(): unable to start tls: protocol error at \/usr\/share\/owncloud\/apps\/user_ldap\/lib\/connection.php#614","level":2,"time":1365454009}
{"app":"php","message":"ldap_start_tls(): unable to start tls: protocol error at \/usr\/share\/owncloud\/apps\/user_ldap\/lib\/connection.php#614","level":2,"time":1365454042}
{"app":"php","message":"ldap_start_tls(): unable to start tls: protocol error at \/usr\/share\/owncloud\/apps\/user_ldap\/lib\/connection.php#614","level":2,"time":1365454078}
{"app":"php","message":"ldap_start_tls(): unable to start tls: protocol error at \/usr\/share\/owncloud\/apps\/user_ldap\/lib\/connection.php#614","level":2,"time":1365454113}
{"app":"php","message":"ldap_start_tls(): unable to start tls: protocol error at \/usr\/share\/owncloud\/apps\/user_ldap\/lib\/connection.php#614","level":2,"time":1365454146}
{"app":"search_lucene","message":"failed to extract meta information for \/0d7d9f80-d31e-1031-8b3c-31c8f205a781\/files\/zotero\/cit3d2g9.prop: unable to determine file format","level":2,"time":1365454168}
{"app":"php","message":"ldap_start_tls(): unable to start tls: protocol error at \/usr\/share\/owncloud\/apps\/user_ldap\/lib\/connection.php#614","level":2,"time":1365454179}
```
